Class Receipt

java.lang.Object
bto.EntitiesProjectRelated.Receipt
public class Receipt extends Object
The Receipt class represents a booking receipt for a BTO flat. It contains details about the booking transaction including the applicant, officer who processed the booking, project information, flat details, and the date when the receipt was generated.

The class also provides functionality to generate a formatted receipt content that can be displayed or printed for the applicant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Receipt

      public Receipt()
      Default constructor for Receipt. Initializes the receipt date to the current date.

    • Receipt

      public Receipt(String applicantNric, String officerNric, String projectName, String flatType, int flatId)
      Parameterized constructor for Receipt. Creates a receipt with the specified details and initializes the receipt date to the current date. Automatically generates the content for the receipt.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant who booked the flat
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer who processed the booking
      projectName - The name of the project where the flat is located
      flatType - The type of flat that was booked
      flatId - The ID of the specific flat that was booked

    • generateContent

      public void generateContent()
      Generates the content for this receipt in a formatted, human-readable form. The content includes applicant details, project information, flat details, processing officer information, and additional important notes.

      This method is called automatically by the parameterized constructor, but can also be called manually to regenerate the content if any details change.
